results.content: First of all please do not take this as an insult or anything. This is an unbiased feedback. Please, stop over exaggeration. Stop shouting man! And what is it with you twisting your tongue? Stop it man! Talk in your own accent. You are Indian, we get it. Stop pretending to be you are not! And keep one instructor. What is it with two instructors? And you literally just displayed a website in the 1 Hour lecture. Nothing else! If you had no other work, you should not have made it ad you are posting courses on Graphics and Design, man have you seen you intro video? What did you download a free template and added your photos? We pay here to get legit information or education! And the first two videos were just podcasts. Its just a 20mins Youtube video man! Don't sell these stuff!

results.content: What a bunch of jokers these instructors are!!! They overlap one another and keep shouting making it hard to listen to what they are saying when using earphones. Strictly not recommended to join this course which just introduces you to carrd.co Anyone with basic web designing skills can learn how to use the site without these kind of 1 hour introductory videos.
